mapper.sql: id, app_id, secret, access_token, expired_time, create_time, modify_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM app_token WHERE expired_time <= #{expiredTime} OR expired_time IS NULL
mapper.insert: insert into app_token (id, app_id, secret, access_token, expired_time, create_time, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into app_token
id,
app_id,
secret,
access_token,
expired_time,
create_time,
modify_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update app_token
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
secret = #{secret,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
access_token = #{accessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expired_time = #{expiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update app_token set app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, secret = #{secret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, access_token = #{accessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expired_time = #{expiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
